demo.title: QA/QC Construction Compliance Demo
demo.subtitle: Experience how our AI-powered system validates construction documents against Saudi building codes
demo.uploadDocumentsDescription: Upload PDF, Word, or CSV files containing construction specifications, plans, or compliance documents.
demo.aiAnalysisDescription: Our system automatically extracts and analyzes key information from your documents using advanced OCR and NLP.
demo.complianceValidationDescription: Compare extracted data against Saudi building codes and regulations to identify compliance gaps.
demo.generateReportsDescription: Receive detailed compliance reports with actionable recommendations and checklist generation.
